original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 8.2. Sahetukaduka
analyzed: sa hetuka duka

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ
analyzed: na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā vicikicchā sahagata

original: uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo
analyzed: uddhacca sahagatam moham paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpe ekam mahābhūtam paṭicca tayo

original: mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: mahābhūtā pe dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā mahābhūte paṭicca citta samuṭṭhāna

original: rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: rūpam kaṭattā rūpam upādā rūpa na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
analyzed: hetu paccayā vicikicchā sahagatam uddhacca sahagatam moham paṭicca sampayuttakāḥ khandhāḥ

original: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sahetukā khandhā. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe vatthum paṭicca sa hetukā khandhāḥ na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ

original: ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na ahetukaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sahetukam ca na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na sahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sahetukam ca na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sahetukam ca na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca na sahetukaḥ ca na ahetukaḥ ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate nava

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāram pi pe sampayutta vāram pi paṭicca vāra sadisam evam vitthāretabba

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasahetuko dhammo
analyzed: na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na sa hetukassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ

original: naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa ca
analyzed: na ahetukassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na sahetukaḥ dhammaḥ na sahetukassa ca

original: naahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na ahetukassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Naahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ na ahetukassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava …pe… sahajāte nava,
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā cattāri anantare nava pe sahajāte nava

original: aññamaññe cha, nissaye upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme
analyzed: aññamaññe cha nissaye upanissaye nava purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi āsevane nava kamme

original: …pe… jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: pe jhāne cattāri magge tīṇi sampayutte cha vippayutte pañca pe avigate nava

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala attike pañhāvāraḥ evam
